abstract: As Apple’s cash balance has piled up, analysts and investors have begun to call more loudly for it to return some of the money to shareholders as dividends.
snippet: As Apple’s cash balance has piled up, analysts and investors have begun to call more loudly for it to return some of the money to shareholders as dividends.
lead_paragraph: Apple has finally decided what to do with its cash hoard of nearly $100 billion.

headline.main: Apple Says It Will Announce a Decision About Its Cash
headline.print_headline: Apple Says It Will Give Its Decision About Cash
